title: igotek
author: igotek
content: mining YEC coins deposits to southxchange.com not receving anymore.There is no txid for transfer BTC. Support not answer.many people reports deposit and withdraw problem on their discord.is it exit scam Code:05/04/23 00:27 BTC -0.15191634  Transfer                      ConfirmedAddress:   my extrenal btc address05/04/23 00:27 BTC -0.00015000               Transfer Fee

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: I have no idea with that exchange but upon looking at it, the chat is active and there have been people that are active there so that's basically is still an on going exchange.And have you tried contacting them and ask some help through their discord channel? I've just read it from other members so it could be where the mods or admins of are active and they've got supports to help you.This is their Discord channel: https://discord.com/invite/HWwb9wv

comments.author: miner29
comments.body: Tell me you are not mining these direct to exchange?Zergpool uses southexchange and shows its active but is done manually.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: igotek on May 04, 2023, 07:43:07 AMmining YEC coins deposits to southxchange.com not receving anymore.Have you tried to talk to the YEC Coin team about the missing Southxchange deposits?QuoteThere is no txid for transfer BTC. Support not answer.The Bitcoin transfer, was it done by your authorization or not?Quoteis it exit scam Too hard to conclude at the moment, but why do you use exchanges that have poor support. Try using better exchanges next time.
